law.catch_line: The licensee shall deduct from the handle:...

section.section:
The licensee shall deduct from the handle:
all the breakage; and
25%.

From the 25% that the licensee deducts from the handle, 9% of the handle shall be paid to the Commission, which shall send it to the Comptroller to be credited to the Fair Hill Improvement Fund established in § 5-908 of the Natural Resources Article.

text.section: Money that remains after deductions are made under subsection (a) of this section shall be returned as winnings to successful bettors.
